programme.title: Bikers, Babes, and Badass Cinema
programme.desc: Bikers, Babes, and Badass ACTION: Revisiting the best of 60s and 70s cult cinema.

programme.title: CC & Company
programme.desc: Football legend Joe Namath steps off the field and in front of the camera for this 1970 action picture directed by television veteran Seymour Robbie. After crossing paths with a dangerous gang in the desert, biker C.C. Ryder (Namath) must rescue the lovely fashion journalist Ann (Ann-Margaret) from their clutches.

programme.title: Mean Machines
programme.desc: Stay off the streets when these Hollywood stars get behind the wheel.

programme.title: Vintage Vixens & Exploitation Classics
programme.desc: Bold and seductive. Provocative and iconic. These boundary-pushing movies live on the edge.

programme.title: Chills and Thrills with Ti West
programme.desc: Director Ti West hosts a thrilling lineup of genre-bending horror, action-packed adventures, mysteries, and more!

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1940s Vol. 1
programme.desc: Your favorite filmmakers explore the eerie classics that defined a decade of supernatural thrills and monster madness.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1940s Vol. 2
programme.desc: These 1940s horror films define the decade's fascination with the supernatural and monstrous.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1970s Vol. 1
programme.desc: Enter the realm of 1970s horror, featuring vampiric tales, psychological terror, and innovative creature features.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1970s Vol. 2
programme.desc: Explore the grittier side of 1970s horror with a collection of gruesome tales that push the boundaries of blood and mayhem.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1970s Vol. 3
programme.desc: Experience the unsettling horror of the 1970s, featuring a mix of psychological tension, supernatural dread, and iconic cult films.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1970s Vol. 4
programme.desc: From supernatural chillers to psychological thrillers, few decades can match the 70s when it comes to horror.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1970s Vol. 5
programme.desc: These 70s horror hits blend iconic slashers, cult classics, and supernatural threats with an atmosphere of terror and paranoia.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1980s Vol. 1
programme.desc: The 1980s delivered a brutal mix of slashers, supernatural terrors, and campy thrills that left a lasting mark on the genre.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1980s Vol. 2
programme.desc: Showcasing the genre's evolving creativity and daring vision, the 1980s delivered a diverse mix of gritty slashers and supernatural chills.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1980s Vol. 3
programme.desc: Exploring the darker side of the 1980s, this collection delves into chilling tales of possession, alien encounters, and psychological horror that pushed the boundaries of the genre.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1990s
programme.desc: From innovative horror to psychological thrills with supernatural elements, these 1990s films redefined the genre.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.sub-title: Big Hair and Big Scares Vol. 1
programme.desc: Hop in the DeLorean and return to the 80s, when slashers ruled the box office.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.sub-title: Big Hair and Big Scares Vol. 2
programme.desc: The nightmare continues with 80s hits and cult classics with Cronenberg, Cujo, and more!

programme.title: The Astral Factor
programme.desc: A convicted killer learns how to become invisible and breaks free from prison. Now, he’s on the loose and out for revenge against the women that sent him to prison.

programme.title: Terror Titans: The Films of Wes Craven and John Carpenter
programme.desc: Two masters of horror bring your nightmares to the big screen in this spine-chilling collection.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.sub-title: Demons, Devils, Chainsaws and Zombies Vol. 1
programme.desc: In a “Deep Red” part of the country, “The Texas Chainsaw Massacre” made all of us squirm like “Three On A Meathook.”

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.sub-title: Demons, Devils, Chainsaws and Zombies Vol. 2
programme.desc: The nightmare never ends as your favorite filmmakers talk iconic horror movies.

programme.title: Carnival of Souls
programme.desc: A young woman tries to escape her traumatic past, only to find herself haunted by a ghoulish mystery man from an abandoned carnival pavilion.

programme.title: Monsters, Monsters Everywhere!
programme.desc: Mutated beasts, creepy crawlies, and more movie monsters are coming to get you!

programme.title: White Zombie
programme.desc: A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiancé, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.

programme.title: Remembering Romero
programme.desc: Looking back at the iconic films of horror director George A. Romero.

programme.title: Karloff: The King of Horror
programme.desc: Boris Karloff's portrayal of monsters and villains made him the undisputed king of 20th century horror.

programme.title: Monsters & Misfits: The Legacy of Lon Chaney Jr.
programme.desc: Celebrate Lon Chaney Jr.’s big screen legacy of classic creatures and complex misfits.

programme.title: Bela Lugosi Beyond Dracula
programme.desc: From monster mashups and horror hijinks, Bela Lugosi was much more than cinema’s greatest vampire.

programme.title: The Dead Walk!
programme.desc: These iconic zombie movies are coming to eat your brain!

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: The dead walk! Seven strangers try to survive the night in a Pennsylvania farmhouse surrounded by flesh-eating zombies.

programme.title: Mad, Mad, Mad Scientists Vol. 1: Monstrous Minds
programme.desc: Enter the minds of the twisted geniuses who gave birth to monstrous creations and big screen horrors.
